verse.name: c1
verse.lines: That beautiful name! That beautiful name newline From sin has power to free us! newline That beautiful name! That wonderful name! newline That matchless name is Jesus.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know of a name, a beautiful name newline That angels brought down to earth. newline They whispered it low, newline One night long ago newline To a maiden of lowly birth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I know of a name, a beautiful name newline That unto a babe was given. newline The stars glittered bright newline Throughout that glad nigh, newline And angels praised God in heaven.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The One of that name, my Savior became newline My Savior of Calvary. newline My sins nailed Him there, newline My burdens He bare.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I love that blest name newline Made higher than all in heaven. newline 'Twas whispered, I know, newline In my heart long ago. newline To Jesus my life I've given.
